# bint ⇔ proto produce? ben √born birth

bint feminine form of ‘ben’ “son”

𒌉 banda₃ young one, child, infant offspring, progeny attendant
𓃀 𓎛 𓄑 𓋴 | calf
𓃀 𓇋 𓈞 𓊌 𓏥 | the produce (of a mine) |

𓅭𓏏 battbatta batt pato = duck
𓅭𓏏 بَطّ baṭṭ from Persian بت bat “duck”
𓅭𓏏 بت bett بِنْت bint בְּרַתָּא bərattā ܒܪܬܐ f (barəṯā “daughter” ⇔ পুত্ৰী putri
